row.description: The row to insert into the sheet. An object where keys are the column names and values are the values to insert.

errorMessage.type: GoogleSheetAppendOne request property "row" should be an object.

raw.description: Store raw values instead of converting as if typed into the sheets UI.

errorMessage.type: GoogleSheetAppendOne request property "options.raw" should be a boolean.
GoogleSheetAppendOne request properties should be an object.

required.row: GoogleSheetAppendOne request should have required property "row".
